about_the_game:
Welcome to Craftia Regency!

Immerse yourself in the world of calming patterns and elegant designs inspired by the grace and charm of the Regency era! Craftia is perfect to relieve stress, enjoy a creative break or as an outlet for self-expression.

Color your own handheld fan, make a unique book cover, or your very own afternoon tea set with cute flowers and ribbons. There are endless possibilities!

Coloring is at the core of Craftia and is designed to be super satisfying. The main coloring pen imitates the feel and perfection of markers. With metallic, matte and shiny coloring pens Craftia is every colorists dream!

Whether you are a seasoned artist or a beginner, Craftia provides a range of designs that you can discover at your own pace.

Use your mouse or any type of graphic tablet to start your coloring adventure with Craftia!

Display your creations in your own abbey! Each room's color scheme and mood can be fully customized. There are different seasons and times of day. Feel free to use the relaxing atmosphere as a background while studying or to make screenshots for your desktop wallpaper!

Go wild! Use stickers and effect pens to go beyond coloring and enjoy Craftia to the fullest. Make lavish cakes, luxurious embroidery and more! Sequins, beads and gemstones will make you needlework sparkle. And there is so much more to discover!




This game is a passion project by a solo developer. You can reach out to me and share your feedback and ideas!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Create your own Regency world with Craftia, a cozy painting and crafting experience. Relax with calming painting sessions, coloring and crafting decor, ornate walls, tea sets, beading and luxurious cakes! There is no right or wrong with Craftia!

English*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*
